title: Australia v England: Ashes second Test, day three – live
summary: The hosts aim to extend their first-innings lead as play continues at the Gabba. Writers provide real-time updates on the match. Stay tuned for over-by-over reports.

title: TV tonight: a mega new Doctor Who spin-off from Russell T Davies
summary: The Sea Devils, featuring Russell Tovey, returns in an Earth invasion epic. Additionally, the night highlights the tragic tale of the Apollo 1 space mission. Don't miss these compelling stories this evening!

title: TV tonight: Nick Cave’s friends tell his hugely moving life story
summary: This evening, Irvine Welsh, Bella Freud, and others delve into the captivating works of Cave. Additionally, there's a delightful Aardman animation featuring a charming little bird. Don't miss these engaging watch options!

title: Dozens of homes destroyed as more than 50 bushfires burn across NSW
summary: Australia faced severe heatwave warnings on Saturday, prompting concerns for public safety. Simultaneously, bushfires were actively burning in several states, exacerbating the situation. Authorities remain vigilant as they manage the dual threats of extreme heat and wildfires.

title: Tim Dowling: our dog is bottom of the class at dog school
summary: A school has given students a whistle that they can use, joining other noises that their dog is scared of. This addition highlights the challenges of managing a pet's anxiety. The initiative aims to address the dog's fears in a supportive environment.
